WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=73764
 
----
Apparently iconv_substr is broken in some older versions of PHP.
http://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=37773
 
As a workaround we can check iconv_substr(), and if it is broken we switch to mb_substr()
WorkItem.Summary: Workaround for iconv_substr() bug in PHP 5.2.0
